name: World Geography Quiz
description:
The ultimate quiz includes the countries and major territories of the world.

MODES:

Regular world quiz.

Study mode (give the correct answer after guessing).

Flag mode (know the countries by their flags).

Speed mode (only 90 seconds to guess as many as possible, fewer points deducted for getting close).

The game also includes over thirty fun facts on the main menu. It is also playable with leaderboards on our website exclamity.com
